statement.p: Explain why the vectors \left[\begin{array}{r} 3 \\ -4 \\ -6 \\ -1 \\ 0 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -4 \\ -4 \\ -2 \\ 4 \\ 5 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -6 \\ -3 \\ -3 \\ -3 \\ 0 \end{array}\right] , \text{ and } \left[\begin{array}{r} 20 \\ 14 \\ 10 \\ -2 \\ -10 \end{array}\right] are linearly dependent or linearly independent.

answer.p: The vectors \left[\begin{array}{r} 3 \\ -4 \\ -6 \\ -1 \\ 0 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -4 \\ -4 \\ -2 \\ 4 \\ 5 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -6 \\ -3 \\ -3 \\ -3 \\ 0 \end{array}\right] , \text{ and } \left[\begin{array}{r} 20 \\ 14 \\ 10 \\ -2 \\ -10 \end{array}\right] are linearly dependent .
